root.name: Skate or Die 2: The Search for Double Trouble
root.description: The IntroSkate or Die 2 is notable for its at the time technicaly very advanced intro featuring voice samples on the NES.http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X8TmIxHSBcUfeature=relatedCharactersYou...You are an unnamed dudeRodneySkateboard store owner, you can buy boards from himLesterRodney's son, you can learn killer tricks from him for a priceCJShe is your friendIcepickThe final bossCreditsGame Design: David Bunch, Eric Knopp, Michael KosakaGame Graphics: Michael KosakaGame Programming: David Bunch, Eric KnoppAdditional Programming: Carl Mey, Tom DeBryMusic: Rob HubbardProducer: Don TraegerSound: Rob HubbardTechnical Direction: Richard HicksVoices: Bob Henderson, Eric KnoppCover Skater: Jef Whitehead (now in the black metal band Leviathan)
